mapper.insert: INSERT INTO `sbdb`.`house_detail_info` ( `house_code`, `house_detail_code`, `house_detail_name`, `room_index`, `room_type`, `room_nick_name`, `floor_area_size`, `wall_area_size`, `ceil_area_size`, `status`, `remark`, `version` ) VALUES( #{houseCode}, #{houseDetailCode}, #{houseDetailName}, #{roomIndex}, #{roomType}, #{roomNickName}, #{floorAreaSize}, #{wallAreaSize}, #{ceilAreaSize}, #{status}, #{remark}, #{version} ) ON DUPLICATE KEY UPDATE house_detail_name=values(house_detail_name), floor_area_size=values(floor_area_size), wall_area_size=values(wall_area_size), ceil_area_size=values(ceil_area_size), status=values(status), remark=values(remark), version=values(version);
